text:
<@U0AKU18CW>: Do you know who was the diro and the deputy diro then? 

<http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/article338886.ece>

attachments.title: Classes at IIT-Kharagpur suspended, director quits
attachments.text: Special CorrespondentKOLKATA: Classes at the Indian Institute of Technology-Kharagpur were suspended on Monday, a day after its director Damodar Acharya resigned following violent protests outside his house by students
attachments.fallback: The Hindu: Classes at IIT-Kharagpur suspended, director quits

text: this article suggests that a `Mr. Chakraborty` was the deputy diro. Was PPC the deputy diro then?

Page 12 : <http://www.iitkgp.ac.in/downloads/iitkgp_09_10.pdf>
The Deputy Director was Prof. Mrityunjoy Chakraborty
We should put up an article on the wiki about this incident. There’s lots of news sources to cite.
yes
Alternatively, put it on the BC Roy page.
In the history section
In the Incompetency section.
Yeah that seems better

Sorry, the deputy director was Madhusudan Chakraborty
<https://web.archive.org/web/20090707022918/http://iitkgp.ac.in/fac-profiles/showprofile.php?empcode=YVmdQ&depts_name=DD>
I'm a little confused
I don't think the banning of TSA and the incident is related
That TSA article is of 2005 and the Hindu is of 2009
So, we have two articles now in that section

I have put up the article. Please see and edit for a better language or more informtion.
<https://wiki.metakgp.org/w/BC_Roy_Technology_Hospital>
I don’t think it should be called incompetence
It should be called Past Incidents
or Criticism
I was kidding about Incompetence :-P
You can put it under a Controversies section, like Wikipedia.
Yeah.
Controversies should do.
